data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Borno, Nigeria that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Borno, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Borno to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 1,182,159 believers in Borno, Nigeria who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Borno, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kanuri, Yerwa people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kanuri, Yerwa people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kanuri, Yerwa people is yours.
Lord, let it be said of the 3,406,541 lost in Borno that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Borno.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Borno, Nigeria has a population of 4,588,700.

We estimate Borno has 1,182,159 people who might know Jesus, 1,167,705 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,238,836 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Borno to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Borno
location.people_groups_list: Duwai, Kupto, Bura, Pabir, Laamang, Ngizim
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Duwai (20,000), Kupto (5,500), Bura, Pabir (502,000), Laamang (76,000), Ngizim (166,000)
